effect.diamond-pearl: Raises the user’s Attack and Special Attack by one stage each. During sunny day, raises both stats by two stages.
effect.platinum: Raises the user’s Attack and Special Attack by one stage each. During sunny day, raises both stats by two stages.
effect.heartgold-soulsilver: Raises the user’s Attack and Special Attack by one stage each. During sunny day, raises both stats by two stages.
